__e: Dear LordJesus, I do not often speak with You and ask for things, but now I really must insist that You help me win the election tomorrow, because I deserve it and Paul Metzler doesn't, as You well know.
I insist you tell them who I am right this minute!
And I must insist that you let no one know that I was here!
I insist that you tell me what you're up to.
I insist you tell me why you... Act so differently this morning.
And I must insist that you let no one know that I was here!
I insist you tell them who I am right this minute!
I don't know what you two- or you three- think you're doing... but I insist that one of your women leave this hotel at once!
Elizabeth, for your sake and for mine,
I don't know why i insisted on coming here. It's always the same.
Sweetie, this is where I insist on a lawyer... right now.
